actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to protect the political rights and privacy of individuals and organizations and to define the authority of the Armed Forces to collect, distribute, and store information about civilian political activity.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Freedom from Surveillance Act - Restricts the authority of the Armed Forces to collect, distribute, and store information about civilian political activity and the activity of social or religious groups. Provides for criminal and civil actions for any violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to protect the political rights and privacy of individuals and organizations and to define the authority of the Armed Forces to collect, distribute, and store information about civilian political activity.
